attributes.action: ask the French Government if we can please borrow for a few weeks the giant duck currently floating in the port of St. Nazaire, near Nantes, France.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe it would be a very welcome addition to the Thames in London,  possibly bobbing up and down outside the Palace of Westminster. Following the huge amount of interest in other creatures found floating down the Thames (namely that unfortunate whale in 2006) this could prove to be a great attraction for visitors and residents alike. At least this one won't die. This request, if granted, would also enhance a sense of cultural and artistic 'entente cordiale' with our French neighbours.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
